title: LoL client randomly closing after game
body: When I press play again or home client closes yes task manager shows client and patcher still running.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is suddenly disconnecting from the game platform service entirely, which is what's causing your client to disappear. This is often caused an unstable connection to the servers, and I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address it.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through that guide.
connection issues? ምናልባት ወደ ፋየርዎል ማሰናከል እና ኮምፒውተርን አጥፍቶ እንደገና ይሞክሩ.
